title: How to Cook Rainbow Shrimp

steps.headline: Remove the skin from the shrimp, tail included.
Cut peppers in half, remove all of the seeds and cut julienne style.
Peel the onion and cut julienne style (only half will be used).
Wash then chop the scallion into fine pieces.
Crush the garlic cloves with the side of a knife and mince.
Pour enough vegetable oil into pan to cover surface.
Heat the frying pan.
steps.description: If it sizzles when you dip a dampened wooden spoon or chopstick into the pan, the pan is hot enough.

steps.headline: Add minced garlic to pan and continuously stir for 5 seconds.
Add onions and stir for 10 seconds.
Add shrimp and stir until the shrimp turns pink.
Add peppers and stir for 15 seconds.
Add 2-4 tablespoons of oyster sauce, or as preferred.
Test taste and add ingredients as preferred .
Add scallions and ground black pepper as garnish and to add to final taste.

text: Preparing the Ingredients Remove the skin from the shrimp, tail included.  Cut peppers in half, remove all of the seeds and cut julienne style.  Peel the onion and cut julienne style (only half will be used).  Wash then chop the scallion into fine pieces.  Crush the garlic cloves with the side of a knife and mince.  Cooking the Dish Pour enough vegetable oil into pan to cover surface.  Heat the frying pan. If it sizzles when you dip a dampened wooden spoon or chopstick into the pan, the pan is hot enough. Add minced garlic to pan and continuously stir for 5 seconds.  Add onions and stir for 10 seconds.  Add shrimp and stir until the shrimp turns pink.  Add peppers and stir for 15 seconds.  Add 2-4 tablespoons of oyster sauce, or as preferred.  Add 1 teaspoon of sugar.  Test taste and add ingredients as preferred .  Add scallions and ground black pepper as garnish and to add to final taste.  Finished.
